definitions.definition: To function under official sanction permitting attacks on enemy shipping and seizing ship and cargo; to engage in government-sponsored piracy .
To advocate or benefit from privatization of government services.

main_definition: To function under official sanction permitting attacks on enemy shipping and seizing ship and cargo; to engage in government-sponsored piracy . [from 17th c.]
secondary_definitions: To advocate or benefit from privatization of government services.
